mapper.select: select t.*, p.ap_name, c.c_name, c.continent, a.a_name from ticketTB t, airportTB p, countryTB c, airlineTB a where t.arrive = p.ap_code and p.country_code = c.c_code and t.flight_code = a.a_code and t.dep_time <= (select SYSDATE from dual)+7 and p.ap_name = #{param1} and seat_able != 0 and ROWNUM >= 1 and ROWNUM <= 4 order by c.continent, c.c_name, p.ap_name, t.price
select t.* from ticketTB t where t.arrive = #{param1} order by t.price
SELECT t.* FROM ticketTB t, airportTB ap, countryTB c WHERE t.arrive = ap.ap_code and ap.country_code = c.c_code and c.continent = #{param1} order by price
select * from ticketTB where price = (select min(price) from ticketTB)
